title: Mental patients' association
creator_credit: ONF | NFB, Shelah Reljic, Peter Jones, John Taylor and Richard Patton
brief_description: The Mental Patients Association was set up to deal with mental patients in the period immediately after discharge from hospital. They have established a “drop-in” centre to help patients in this transitory period. Interviews members of the association, discusses the problems encountered in a mental hospital. Shows the work and activities of the association.
